txt.en: In many Skirmishes, there will be other NPC Defenders who will assist you. Some are important and must not be lost. Others will not be necessary to protect. All Defenders will provide you with bonus Skirmish Marks if they survive at the end of the Skirmish.

In many Skirmishes, there will be other NPC Defenders who will assist you. Some are important and must not be lost. Others will not be necessary to protect. All Defenders will provide you with bonus Marks if they survive at the end of the Skirmish.
